name: DJ Star
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Get The Party Started With DJ Star!

Mix, scratch and fade your way to fame and fortune as you pack out the dance floor with banging tunes! Head over to the Creation Studio and create your very own tracks then fly around the world playing at some of the hottest party locations on the globe, London, Ibiza, Miami and more...
  • FEATURED TRACKS:
  • I'M NOT ALONE*
  • SHOW ME LOVE*
  • ACCEPTABLE IN THE 80'S*
  • PJANOO*
  • CHANGE CLOTHES*
*performed by John Stage Band
